name: Lagnacure Legend
overview: ArtDink, makers of quirky games like Tail of the Sun, will be releasing a new Playsation RPG this summer in Japan. Called Lagnacure Legend and sequel to Lagnacure, the game is fully 3D and utilizes a new battle system unlike its predecessor called Active Real Time Battle. The player will use fighting game-esque commands to perform special attacks and combos. There will also be a defend button. You can choose to play as eight characters, each with their own story. MAIN CHARACTERS: -Eran is the son of the hero of the first Lagnacure Other character are three females charcters: Karen, Kora and Reeve The game takes place fifteen years after the first Lagnacure.
